headline: Guggenheim cuts PG&E stock rating amid regulatory uncertainty
summary: Investing.com -- Guggenheim downgraded PG&E Corp (NYSE:PCG) to Neutral from Buy given an ongoing regulatory uncertainty in California despite the utility’s strong fundamentals.

headline: PG&E tries to reassure investors amid growing wildfire concerns
summary: Significant improvement in the company's credit rating may not be possible in the near term, company officials said Thursday. The utility wants California to expand its public wildfire insurance fund.
